description: GEORGE GILDER, one of the leading economic and technological thinkers of the past 40 years, is the author of 19 books, including Wealth and Poverty, Life after Television, Knowledge and Power, and The Scandal of Money. A founding fellow of the Discovery Institute where he began his study of information theory, he is an influential venture investor.
name: George Gilder
